author: Jerome Hudson, Jerome Hudson
title: Hollywood Erupts After Trump Halts The WHO Funding: 'F**ing Moron'
description: The World Health Organization (WHO) has parroted falsehoods about the coronavirus since early January. President Trump announced a halt in WHO funding on Tuesday, and like clockwork, left-wing heads in Hollywood exploded.
content: The World Health Organization (WHO) has parroted falsehoods about the coronavirus since early January. It pushed a false claim from Chinese authorities that there was no evidence of human-to-human transmission of the virus. WHO Director-General, Tedros Adhano… [+4931 chars]
